mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.category_id, c.name AS category_name, p.name, p.description, p.base_price AS min_sku_price, p.average_rating, p.review_count, p.status, p.created_at FROM et_product p JOIN et_category c ON c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} AND p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.status IN ('ON_SALE', 'SOLD_OUT')
mapper.update: UPDATE et_product p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, COALESCE(AVG(rating), 0) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM et_product_review WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY product_id ) r ON r.product_id = p.product_id SET p.average_rating = COALESCE(r.avg_rating, 0), p.review_count = COALESCE(r.cnt, 0) WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.sku_id, s.price, s.stock, s.status, so.option_value_id FROM et_product_sku s LEFT JOIN et_product_sku_option so ON so.sku_id = s.sku_id WHERE s.product_id = #{productId} AND s.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY s.sku_id ASC, so.option_value_id ASC
